sense.def:
Kar se bo zgodilo
soon
, se bo zgodilo v kratkem. Kar se je zgodilo
soon after a particular time or event
, se je zgodilo nedolgo po določenem času ali dogodku.

seg.quote: He rented a TV soon after moving into his apartment.
Contact the police as soon as possible.
I swore I'd get out soonest.

sense.def:
Izraz
the sooner the better
uporabimo, kadar mislimo, da je nekaj treba narediti v najkrajšem možnem času.

cit.quote: čim prej tem bolje, kar najhitreje

seg.quote: The sooner we get out the better.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se bo nekaj zgodilo
sooner or later
, smo prepričani, da se bo zgodilo, čeprav morda še ne tako kmalu.

seg.quote: If you do not look after it carefully, sooner or later your car will fall to bits.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se bo nekaj zgodilo
as soon as something else happens
, mislimo, da se bo zgodilo neposredno za nečim drugim.

seg.quote: As soon as we get the tickets we'll send them to you.

sense.def:
No sooner did one thing happen than another thing happened
pomeni, da se je druga stvar zgodila neposredno za prvo.

seg.quote: No sooner had he closed his eyes than he fell asleep.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
would sooner do something
, bi si bolj želel delati tisto stvar kot neko drugo.

seg.quote: I would sooner read than watch television.
